764990.name: Whack the Serial Killer 20 Ways plus Neighbour, Burglars...
764990.description:
An Animated Gorefest Where You Take on a Serial Killer!

Abducted and tied up in a basement by a psychopathic serial killer, it's up to you to turn the tables on this crazy freak and find all the ways to kill him in the most brutal and bizarre ways.

Featuring the Most Crazy Torture Methods from History!

What better way to take revenge on a serial killer than using his barbaric devices against him? In Whack the Serial Killer there's a whole range of crazy methods from the past.


3 Previous Chapters Also Included Making 4 Games in Total!


All 3 previous entertaining whack games optimised for HD play and included for free with Whack the Serial Killer!

*Warning!* These games aren't for everyone, but for those who love bloody animations and crazy creative kills all four are the perfect way to spend a small amount of your day.
764990.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
